summary: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Sang-kyung Kim|Roe-ha Kim|Jae-ho Song|Byun Hee-Bong|Seo-hie Ko|Tae-ho Ryu|No-shik Park|Hae-il Park|Mi-seon Jeon|Young-hwa Seo|Woo Go-na|Ok-joo Lee|Jong-ryol Choi|Seung-mok Yoo|Hun-Kyung Lee|Hyeon-jong Sin|Jae-eung Lee|In-sun Jung|Byung-gil Kwon|Bong-gi Baek|Hyeon-gi Choi|Deok-jae Jo|Moon-Eui Jo|Ha-kyeong Kim|Joo-ryeong Kim|Dong-yong Lee|Yong Oh|Hyun-young Park|Jin-woo Park|Tae-kyeong Park|Sung-bo Shim|Dong-hwan Shin|Kang-gook Son|Jin-ho Song|Ga-hyun Yun|Noah Segura
keywords: serial killer|based on true story|1980s|anti hero|criminal investigation
title: Memories of Murder (Crónica de un asesino en serie)
